actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to extend for 1 year the authorization for the emergency job programs under title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
short_title: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act

summary.text: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act - Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary for fiscal year 1976 to carry out the emergency jobs program under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act.

titles.title: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act
A bill to extend for 1 year the authorization for the emergency job programs under title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
